repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.unittitle: Kendall and Hamlin School District No. 8 Records

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Kendall and Hamlin School District No. 8

did.abstract: Includes board minutes and reports for the Kendall and Hamlin School District No. 8, located in the area of Morton, Monroe County, New York.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Kendall and Hamlin School District which was formerly the Clarkson (or Union) and Kendall School District No. 12, was located in the area of Morton, Monroe County, New York.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes board minutes and reports for the school district.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and is likely disorganized. Individual items may be difficult to find.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted because it is unprocessed. While it is likely that portions of the collection may be viewed, access must be managed by an archivist.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows: Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Kendall and Hamlin School District No. 8 Records, 1838-1920. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Kendall and Hamlin School District No. 8 Records).

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was purchased from a dealer in 1968.
